com.hourglassapps.cpi_ii.stem.snowball.lucene

Class SnowballAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      • com.hourglassapps.cpi_ii.stem.snowball.lucene.SnowballAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Deprecated. 
    (3.1) Use the language-specific analyzer in modules/analysis instead. This analyzer will be removed in Lucene 5.0

    @Deprecated
public final class SnowballAnalyzer
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
    Filters StandardTokenizer with StandardFilter, LowerCaseFilter, StopFilter and SnowballFilter. Available stemmers are listed in org.tartarus.snowball.ext. The name of a stemmer is the part of the class name before "Stemmer", e.g., the stemmer in org.tartarus.snowball.ext.EnglishStemmer is named "English".

    NOTE: This class uses the same Version dependent settings as StandardAnalyzer, with the following addition:

    • As of 3.1, uses TurkishLowerCaseFilter for Turkish language.
